m_szDocSumamry: Geothermal Firm Offers First Pay-by-the-Kilowatt-Hour Plan February 14th, 2011 by Susan Kraemer   New Hampshire-based geothermal ground heat exchange company LVestus Energy has just begun a Geo Thermal Purchase Agreement (GeoTPA) program that makes green,  geothermal energy a cost-effective way to heat or cool a commercial  facility – for no upfront money – the same way that you can buy solar power.
